attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the government is bleeding the British tax payer to death!! and now i have seen what the fools are doing now.The add on to car tax in 2009 they want to be in are shoes for a few weeks to see how hard it is to live they are plonkers labour are the worst ever why should people not have a nice car are four by four.They get on my nerves kick them out time for a new leader.
